ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisAppointment of STEPHANIE PINTO of Calgary, Alberta, to be a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Calgary Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective January 3, 2019.
